title: Customer Success Representative
job_overview:
Company: Conserva
Location: Remote (Must work according to Eastern Standard Time)
Schedule: Full-time, Monday–Friday, 11AM–8PM EST


About Conserva:
Conserva is a forward-thinking company dedicated to administering solar system warranties and services. We pride ourselves on delivering exceptional customer support and high-quality service to our clients, all while fostering an inclusive, remote-first work culture. We are excited to welcome talented professionals to join our dynamic team.

Position: Inbound Customer Success Representative

What You’ll Do:

- Handle incoming customer inquiries via phone, email, or chat with a focus on delivering prompt, friendly, and effective service.
- Assist customers with questions regarding solar system warranties, services, and troubleshooting.
- Provide clear and accurate information to help resolve issues or direct customers to the appropriate departments.
- Document customer interactions and update records in our CRM system with precision.
- Collaborate with teaUpgrade to see actual infombers to continuously improve service quality and customer satisfaction.
- Adhere to daily, weekly, and monthly performance targets while maintaining a positive customer experience.
- Provide assistance on other internal tasks as needed.

What We’re Looking For:

- Exceptional Communication: Excellent command of English (both verbal and written) is essential for clear and empathetic customer interactions.
- Customer-Centric Mindset: You’re patient, attentive, and committed to ensuring each customer feels heard and supported.
- Problem-Solving Skills: Ability to troubleshoot and resolve customer concerns effectively.
- Organizational Skills: Strong time-management and record-keeping skills are vital in a remote setting.
- Experience: Previous experience in customer service or a related field is preferred, but enthusiastic and motivated candidates are welcome.
- Remote Readiness: A reliable internet connection, a quiet workspace, and the discipline to work remotely are required.
What We Offer:

Competitive Compensation: $1,000 USD per month (with two pay days per month).

Career Growth: Opportunities for professional advancement and development through ongoing training and mentorship.

Inclusive, Remote-First Environment: Join a diverse international team dedicated to supporting your success—no matter where you’re located.

Industry Impact: Be part of a company that is committed to renewable energy and sustainable solutions.

Ready to Make a Difference?
As the first step of the process, please use Upgrade to see actual info to create a free short video of yourself speaking and include the link to this video in your application message.
